import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Currency Calculator'; description = "hey this is a currency calculator" process(){ var curr1:String = ((document.getElementById('curr1'))).value; console.log(curr1) var curr2: String = ((document.getElementById('curr2'))).value; console.log(curr2) } }
